title: Change in business conditions on LF market

content.question: If investors feel that business conditions will deteriorate in the future, the demand for loans and real interest rate in the loanable funds market will change in which of the following ways in the short run?

choices.label: Demand for Loans Real Interest Rate Increase Increase
Demand for Loans Real Interest Rate Increase Decrease
Demand for Loans Real Interest Rate Decrease Increase
Demand for Loans Real Interest Rate Decrease Decrease
Demand for Loans Real Interest Rate Decrease Not change

content.answer: Demand for Loans Real Interest Rate Decrease Decrease

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
